author: kanagwa
content: Hey <@388610194608750595> I'm looking into the task of generating a new test vector set to start early testing of the builder API changes from EIP-4844

author: kanagwa
content: Would you mind sharing more context on the process flashbots team follows to test this kind of fork changes. Thank you

author: jimmygchen
content:
Not sure if this is useful, but just reading through some tests on the `mev-boost` code base, and saw a test for `GetPayload`, which uses data from `consensus-spec-tests` 
https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/blob/main/server/service_test.go#L629

I guess this will need to be updated for Capella & EIP-4844
https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/blob/main/testdata/signed-blinded-beacon-block-case0.json
